summary: After ten years of doing nothing, Orel and Gringe are in their mid 30s and they struggle to finish their first rap album. Their texts are mostly sex jokes and booze stories and reflect the ... See full summary »
cast: Orelsan|Gringe|Seydou Doucouré|Claude Urbiztondo Llarch|Abdoulaye Doucouré|Paul Minthe|Skread|Sophie de Fürst|Chloé Astor|Redouanne Harjane|Isabelle Alfred|Alain Dion|Tobias Nuytten-Vialle|Mathilde Lamusse|Marc Brunet|Janine Cotentin|Clement Cotentin|Martine Forster|France Hofnung|Chloé Jeffrotin|Amélie Hec|Nathalie Kent|Philippe Levillain|Vincent Nemeth|Tatiana Vialle|Lisha Pu|Rémi Mereu|Thomas Delannet|Jean-Noel Tronc|Thomas Defer|Matthieu Parisot
title: Comment c'est loin
